dcterms:description: A large dataset containing chest radiographs in DICOM format with free-text radiology reports, used for training and validation in radiology report summarization tasks.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-CXR Dataset

dcterms:creator: Johnson et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing radiology reports from Indiana University, used for validation in radiology report summarization tasks.
dcterms:title: Indiana Dataset
